long_description: Stash the uber-portable REI Compact Travel umbrella in your pocket, purse or briefcase and you'll always be prepared for a downpour. Lightweight polyester canopy provides tough protection without bulkiness; 40 in. arc offers ample coverage. Steel shaft and rib construction stands up to strong winds and increases the durability of the umbrella; 5-section manual telescoping shaft. Easy-gripping rubber-coated handle helps you keep a solid grasp when the wind is blowing. Includes an umbrella sleeve/carrying case.
short_description: Stash the uber-portable REI Compact Travel umbrella in your pocket, purse or briefcase and you'll always be prepared for a downpour.
